Vigilance
[i]Hired Sword[/i] – If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast Beowolf, Free Knight, create X 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance, where X is the amount of mana from Treasures spent to cast him.
[i]Follow-Up[/i] – Whenever Beowolf, becomes blocked by a creature with lesser toughness, he gains double strike until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up [/i]– Whenever Beowolf attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, scry 2, then draw a card.
